sections.text:
44-8902.Applicability of act.

Except as provided in sections 44-8905, 44-8906, and 44-8907, the Standard Valuation Act applies to those policies and contracts issued on or after the operative date of the valuation manual designated in subsection (2) of section 44-8908.

SourceLaws 2014, LB755, ยง 2.
